org.apache.flink.metrics.prometheus

类 PrometheusReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.metrics.prometheus.PrometheusReporter
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    MetricReporter

    @PublicEvolving
public class PrometheusReporter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MetricReporter
    MetricReporter that exports Metrics via Prometheus.

      • getPort

        @VisibleForTesting
int getPort()

      • replaceInvalidChars

        @VisibleForTesting
static java.lang.String replaceInvalidChars(java.lang.String input)

      • open

        public void open(MetricConfig config)
        从接口复制的说明: MetricReporter
        Configures this reporter. Since reporters are instantiated generically and hence parameter-less, this method is the place where the reporters set their basic fields based on configuration values.

        This method is always called first on a newly instantiated reporter.

        指定者:
        open 在接口中 MetricReporter
        参数:
        config - A properties object that contains all parameters set for this reporter.

      • close

        public void close()
        从接口复制的说明: MetricReporter
        Closes this reporter. Should be used to close channels, streams and release resources.
        指定者:
        close 在接口中 MetricReporter

        指定者:
        notifyOfAddedMetric 在接口中 MetricReporter
        参数:
        metric - the metric that was added
        metricName - the name of the metric
        group - the group that contains the metric
